oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Open Hearing with Winston Burdett - 1947-02-04 - CBS
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Radio broadcast of Open Hearing, a CBS network show on February 4th, 1947 hosted by Winston Burdett. Guest appearances by Owen Brewster and Herbert J. Ellison.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Winston Burdett; Herbert J. Ellison; Owen Brewster
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Show synopsis and opening statements / (1:10) Winston Burdett opens the show discussing the radio show’s topic, Argentina and Nazi Germany / (3:32) Herbert Ellison, Owen Brewster, and Winston Burdett discuss the show’s topic [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Brewster, Owen, 1888-1961; Ellison, Herbert J.; Burdett, Winston, 1913-1993; CBS Inc.
